name: Save the Earth (KAustinn)
description:
Save the Earth from asteroid using missiles, and even a SUPER asteroid that comes everyone 1 minute!

To play all you gotta do is move your mouse to where you wanna shoot and click!

--Credit--

The Music is not by me!

Get the song here (http://soundimage.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/8-Bit-Mayhem.mp3)
